ca.ualberta.cs.team1travelexpenseapp

Class EditExpenseActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • ca.ualberta.cs.team1travelexpenseapp.EditExpenseActivity

  • public class EditExpenseActivity
extends Activity
    View for adding/editing an Expense item. Provides a user interface from which the user can fill in the info for an Expense item.
